textfields.tf: Calibrate the height sensors of the rear axle of this motor vehicle! Your PIN2 during this exercise is "ABCD".
Loading simulation ...
As next arrange the spacer tube.
As next lower the vehicle frame on the spacer tube completely.
As next address the upper level.
As next address the lower level.
To remove the spacer tube, sufficient interspace is required. In this simulation the upper level has to be achieved before.
To arrange this spacer tube, sufficient interspace between the longitudinal beam and the axle is required. In this simulation the upper level has to be achieved before.
To arrange this spacer tube, sufficient interspace between the longitudinal beam and the axle is required.
Start the diagnosis software using the symbol on the right.
Select the appropriate command in the "System" menu.
Confirm with OK.
Click on "Start calibration".
Enter your PIN2 "ABCD".
Confirm with OK.
Activate "Rear axle left" and "Rear axle right".
To arrange the spacer tube, sufficient interspace is required. In this simulation the upper level has to be achieved before.
As next arrange the spacer tube.
As next lower the vehicle frame onto the spacer tube completely.
Store the current level as driving level.
Address the upper level.
Store the current level as upper level.
To be able to address the lower level, remove the spacer tube.
Address the lower level.
Store the current level as lower level.
